name: NodeFilter
description: A NodeFilter interface represents an object used to filter the nodes in a NodeIterator or TreeWalker. A NodeFilter knows nothing about the document or traversing nodes; it only knows how to evaluate a single node against the provided filter.

refs.name: DOM
refs.description: The definition of 'NodeFilter' in the 'DOM' specification.
